snippet: Fernando Martinez, who was signed to great fanfare in 2005, was put on waiver by the Mets this week and was claimed by Houston.
abstract: Fernando Martinez, who was signed to great fanfare in 2005, was put on waiver by the Mets this week and was claimed by Houston.
lead_paragraph: When Fernando Martinez signed with the Mets on July 11, 2005, there was great excitement surrounding a 16-year-old from the Dominican Republic who was projected to become an elite outfielder.

headline.main: Once a Top Prospect, Martinez Is Headed to Houston
